title: Keycloak 25.0.2 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Upgrade to Infinispan 15.0.7.Final   BUGS   * NPM library of account-ui is unusable (@keycloak/keycloak-account-ui version    25.0.1) account/ui  * Hide save / update buttons in account console for READ_ONLY federated    accounts account/ui  * Hidden options shown in help all dist/quarkus  * Joining group for user doesn't list correct number of groups admin/ui  * Duplicate Key "validatingX509CertsHelp" in admin-ui messages admin/ui  * Admin API extremely slow with service account and fine-grained authorization    `view-users` admin/fine-grained-permissions  * Event tables have broken aria-labels admin/ui  * MSSQL test container can't start ci  * CURL commands in build don't check the response code ci  * localization not work with user attribute display name in users add admin/ui  * "Use metadata descriptor URL" switch is always set to "On" admin/ui  * Documentation for `Delete Credential` action and related changes    authentication  * Keycloak 25 SAML IdP has made Single Logout URL mandatory. saml  * Windows builds fail too often due to problems with the download of Node ci  * Network error attempting to view events without permissions admin/ui  * Network error attempting to view user registeration without permissions    admin/ui  * Look around window cannot be set to 0 admin/ui  * Offline session bug on 25.0.2 core  * Session list doesn't handle non-existing client gracefully core  * Table names for persistent sessions upgrading guide is wrong docs  * Session list not appearing: SQL Error "The incoming request has too many    parameters"  * Migration to persistent sessions fails from Keycloak version storage
